pkgmetadata.longdescription: General Package for Meta-Analysis // User-friendly general package providing standard methods for meta-analysis and supporting Schwarzer, Carpenter, and Rcker DOI:10.1007/978-3-319-21416-0, "Meta-Analysis with R" (2015): - common effect and random effects meta-analysis; - several plots (forest, funnel, Galbraith / radial, L'Abbe, Baujat, bubble); - three-level meta-analysis model; - generalised linear mixed model; - logistic regression with penalised likelihood for rare events; - Hartung-Knapp method for random effects model; - Kenward-Roger method for random effects model; - prediction interval; - statistical tests for funnel plot asymmetry; - trim-and-fill method to evaluate bias in meta-analysis; - meta- regression; - cumulative meta-analysis and leave-one-out meta- analysis; - import data from 'RevMan 5'; - produce forest plot summarising several (subgroup) meta-analyses.
